reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Lindsey and Brett for being a responsible and professional company."

Joshua sent me pictures of the roof damage, and pictures of the repaired roof.  He helped me through the process of dealing with the insurance company, filing a claim, and came back when the adjuster came out. The roofers came out in a … More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you so much for your review! Josh takes pride in his work and we value you so much as a customer.

We've replaced our roof several times over the years due to hail damage and had used a different roofing company each time. Needless to say, we now know way more about roofing products, the installation process, and various roofing … More

I called Rise the morning after the storm's in Fort Worth after sustaining damage on a rental property.  They were on the roof within 2 hours with tarps covering the damaged areas. They have kept me informed during these trying times.  They will be my go to for all of our homes. Highly recommended  Rise! More Response from the owner 2 years ago Thank you Scott!! We are still working our hardest to get your claimed approved! We will get representing you on you and your families behalf.
